member.name: T:api.roulette.LambdaEntryPoint
member.summary:
This class extends from APIGatewayProxyFunction which contains the method FunctionHandlerAsync which is the actual Lambda function entry point. The Lambda handler field should be set to
api.roulette::api.roulette.LambdaEntryPoint::FunctionHandlerAsync

member.name: M:api.roulette.LambdaEntryPoint.Init(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostBuilder)
member.summary:
Use this override to customize the services registered with the IHostBuilder.
It is recommended not to call ConfigureWebHostDefaults to configure the IWebHostBuilder inside this method. Instead customize the IWebHostBuilder in the Init(IWebHostBuilder) overload.

member.name: T:api.roulette.LocalEntryPoint
member.summary: The Main function can be used to run the ASP.NET Core application locally using the Kestrel webserver.
